accountSetup.aspirationAnswerField.toolt: When this functionality will be added, by choosing the Public setting, the application will be able to match other people with your same aspirations within your company, in order to offer you the possibility offline to join forces and collaborate on the achievement of your common pursuits. If you choose the Private setting, you will lose out on this opportunity, and the data will only be displayed in your dashboard for your own viewing.
